branchCategory.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Water Hammer Relief

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Water Hammer Relief

branchItem.name: VXR2000 Single Unit, Pilot Operated, Water Hammer Relief Style
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Alleviate water hammer by using integrated check valve and low valve closing speed mechanism <LI>Fluid: Water and Oil <LI> Port size: 1/2 to 2 inch <LI>Class B or Class H coil insulation available <LI>Valve type: normally closed and normally open</LI></UL>
